New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 71st international hundred, equalling Ricky Ponting's tally of international hundreds.
Bhuvneshwar Kumar's 5-wicket haul restricted Afghanistan to 111, his second T20I five-wicket haul
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli's unbeaten 122 off 61 balls helped India post 212 for 2 in Dubai
India secured a 101-run win over Afghanistan
Pre-Game Insights: India looked set for a massive total with Kohli on song and 87 for no loss in 10 overs
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli dedicated his 71st international century to Anushka Sharma, daughter Vamika
Virat Kohli's 71st hundred was his first since November 2019
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan, which won its group games against Sri Lanka and Bangladesh, faltered in the Super 4 stage, losing all three of its games
